HandleMousePress(int, int) - Method in class com.swop.ScrollBarViewModel
React to a MousePress on (x,y): if the scrollbar is active and (x,y) is on the scrollbar: if it's on the handle, start dragging else if the click is above the handle move it up a bit else the click is below the handle, move it down a bit
